name: Getting Food (Mini Jam 73)
description:
Controls: the car will follow your mouse and press space to slow down time

So Hopefully there are no bugs because i cant bug test for now, this was made for the mini jam 73 and my first game jam on itch, this was also made on scratch. Also i know sadly when the speech bubbles appear it makes it more then 5 colour but i couldnt do anything about so hopefully thats ok as the rest of game is pretty much 4 colour, also this is quite simple and i wish i had the time to create more levels. Not much else to say then i hope you enjoy.
